member.name: P:dbLib.dbFields.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Readonly property returns a dbTableField by index
member.param: A 0 based array refers to the index of the field.
member.remarks: If index is out of range, Nothing is returned

member.name: T:dbLib.dbFields
member.summary: An object that is sent to dbManager which specifies fields and data. It's can be used for adding tables, viewing data from tables and more.

member.name: P:dbLib.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:dbLib.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:dbLib.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
